title: Loft-style living at Locust Point in Fitler Square
description: Loft-style living at Locust Point in Fitler Square. This 1 bedroom condominium features hardwood floors, high ceilings, and oversized windows. The kitchen has cherry cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and granite countertops, all open to the living room. The mezzanine bedroom is adjacent to the bathroom with spacious granite vanity and tub/shower combo. Also featured is a stacked washer and dryer. Locust Point is a boutique elevator building centrally located in the heart of Fitler Square, in close proximity to CHOP, UPenn, Drexel, 30th Street Station, and Rittenhouse Square. It is situated directly adjacent to the Schuylkill River jogging, walking & biking trail, as well as the dog park, tennis courts, community garden, and Markward Playground. Not into exercising outdoors? Not a problem -- Locust Point features a private fitness center on the lobby level.

The interiors feature wide oak flooring, solid and large windows for a bright, airy, and open feeling, complemented by refined materials, high ceilings, crown moldings and modern details that bring a timeless element to living. title: Modern condominium in a historic townhouse
description: Modern condominium in a historic townhouse in the wonderful Washington Square West neighborhood. This is a one bedroom, 1.5 bath bi-level condo on the 2nd and 3rd floor of this boutique 4-unit condominium building. The building’s entry hall retains the grand feel of the original townhome with the original moldings, doors, entry vestibule and stairwell. Enter this unit from the second-floor landing into a spacious living room that has a row of over-sized windows on one side and a corner wood burning fireplace. There is a half bath, and a large eat-in kitchen with windows on three sides. The appliances are mostly stainless steel and new over the last year. There are custom cabinets, hardwood floors and granite countertops. The second floor has an open den or office space. Both it and the bedroom are flooded with light from the south and west facing windows. The bedroom has a large en suite bathroom and a full-size washer and dryer. There is a door in the bedroom leading to a rear deck for evening meals or star gazing. The building has both an intercom camera and buzzer system, and security cameras around the exterior. Each unit in the building has a large (est. 10’ x 14’) storage space in the basement. This home is in the heart of the highly sought after Wash West neighborhood between the historic homes of Spruce and Clinton Streets. The neighborhood is loaded with trendy shops, coffee houses and restaurants, including two restaurants on the corner. The Whole Foods and Acme grocery stores are two blocks away. There are three parks within a few blocks including Kahn Park, which is maintained by neighborhood volunteers, Washington Square historic square, and Seger Park, which includes basketball & tennis courts, a large playground and a dog run. The bike trail running across Center City is on the corner and there are lots of gym options in the neighborhood. The trail connects the larger trails running through Fairmount Park and the new Delaware River trail. There are also a number of parking options nearby. Public transport options heading in every direction are within 1-3 blocks.

title: Just off the gorgeous tree-lined Spruce Street
description:
Just off the gorgeous tree-lined Spruce Street and hidden behind the grand historic facade lies the secret gardens of the condo community known as Strickland Row. Here is your chance to own your very own "hidden gem.” Named for the famous Philadelphian Architect William Strickland, the association is made up of a group of six similar mansion-style homes that were converted to condos. Access this residence through the designated mansion connected to the manicured gardens with a private entrance to your very own, 1 bedroom 1 bath home. The residence complete with high ceilings, moldings and wood floors is very grand. There is a side kitchen and full bath. The bedroom has an oversized walk in closet and storage above.
Enjoy a different water view right here in Philly by beginning your day pool side! This condo comes with an in-ground pool complete with your very own maintenance staff. Take a break for lunch and fire up the grill. You can actually have a grill in this upscale condominium community and dine in one of three courtyards. Looking for a skyline view? Take lunch up to the roof top and enjoy a magnificent 360 degree view of the Center City skyline. Grab your bike from the west side courtyard complete with secure bike storage and hop onto one of the dedicated bike lanes right outside your door, ride to the Schuylkill Bank Trails and coast along the river. Relax by your wood burning fireplace and take in the beauty of your home. Make no mistake, this condo has it all conveniently located to all the major hospitals, restaurants, museums and shopping. Make this your home.

title: This is an elegant entry vestibule unit at The Lenox Condo
description: This is an elegant entry vestibule unit at The Lenox Condominium, one of the best pre-war buildings in the city. It also has one of the nicest layouts at the Lenox. It is a SE corner unit on a high floor with lots of windows, including 3 bay windows, great light and fantastic views. This unit is the largest one-bedroom in the building and has the same square footage as most two bedrooms units. The vestibule, large rooms and high ceilings give the home a grand look and feel. One side of the vestibule leads to a spacious living room with built in bookcases and two bay windows, a formal dining room and a beautiful kitchen. The fully renovated kitchen includes custom cabinets, stainless steel appliances, ceramic tile flooring and granite countertops. The other side of the vestibule has a huge bedroom that has a den, built in bookcases, walk-in-closet and a bay window. The master bedroom has a closet organizing system. The home has a split unit air conditioning system. The Lenox was designed by famed New York architects Clinton and Russell. It was built in 1920 and renovated into condos in 2004-5. The units have large scale rooms, high ceilings, lots of windows and most units have many of their original architectural elements. It is a doorman building and is centrally located at the southern end of Mid-town Village in Washington Square West. It is two blocks from the great shops, restaurants, theatres, Kimmel Center and night life of Midtown Village, Walnut Street and the Avenue of the Arts. It is also just a few blocks from Thomas Jefferson and Pennsylvania Hospitals. There are many gym, parking and public transportation options nearby. The Lenox has a large central laundry room, but the association now allows owners to install individual units within owner condos, with some restrictions and installation requirements.

title: Brewerytown luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt with parking space!
description:
3106 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. Discover an extravagant kitchen with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher–which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.

Central Air/Heat
Washer Dryer

2 entrances

Gas stove
3 full bathrooms
Tons of natural light

title: Beautiful Naval Square, 2-story, lower level 3-bed, 2.5 bath end unit
description:
Just Listed for Rent! Beautiful Naval Square, 2-story, lower level 3-bedroom, 2.5 bath end unit with attached garage! Situated down a lovely, lush, landscaped pathway, this well maintained home features a private terrace spanning the entire width of the property. 1st floor: open concept living/dining space, discreet 1/2 bath, expansive kitchen with stainless appliance package, white shaker style cabinetry, stone counters, large pantry & marble backsplash. Gorgeous hardwood flooring, and plenty of recessed lights grace the entire first level. Large coat/ storage closet located underneath the stairs.
2nd floor: spacious owner’s retreat with oversized walk-in-closet completely outfitted with built-ins, luxe bath with private WC, linen closet, dual sinks, soaking tub & separate stall shower. Granite and tile upgrades. 2 additional sun-filled bedrooms boast 8 ft french sliders leading to a large covered terrace. Laundry area with washer/dryer and a shared hall bath complete this level. Abundant built-in storage closets & shelving located in the garage. Neutral paint throughout. Naval Square amenities: concierge, gated community with 24-hour security, state-of-the-art fitness center, heated outdoor pool, ample visitor parking, spacious common room in Biddle Hall (available for private functions). Enjoy the outdoor amenities of the 20-acre park-like setting, including picnic areas, well-kept gardens & mature Sycamore trees. Very close proximity to South Street Bridge, UPenn, CHOP, HUP & Drexel. Exciting restaurants, shops, & cafes located just outside the gates in Graduate Hospital, Fitler Square, & Rittenhouse Square. Brand new Heirloom Market by Giant just steps outside the community! Directly out the back gate you can enjoy the Schuylkill River Park, including the award winning-trail & boardwalk and Markward Playground! Landlord prefers 2 year lease. Available Feb 15th 2023.

title: Rent this gorgeous rowhome on Madison Square, one of Philadelphia's un
description:
Rent this gorgeous rowhome on Madison Square, one of Philadelphia's unique and coveted "Garden Blocks". Enjoy the quiet walk along this historical pedestrian-only street to your front door, and enter the new light & airy living space designed for modern living. Be greeted by the 1st floor open concept living space that includes a fully-equipped kitchen enhanced by striking chandeliers, a custom range hood, enormous gas cooktop and oven, with a large island / breakfast bar. The white cabinetry, designer appliances and all living spaces are enhanced by brass-toned hardware, exposed beams and warm woodwork throughout. The first floor also provides access your designer half bath and rear patio. Staircases leading down to the finished basement and up to the 2nd floor bedrooms feature attractive woodwork. The 2nd floor showcases 2 large bedrooms with ample closet space along with a full hall bath. The primary bedroom features an en-suite bathroom with spacious shower. This newly renovated home is situated in the heart of Graduate Hospital and is a short walking distance to Center City, Philadelphia's central business district. This home also has excellent access to University City, which includes the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia complex and the University of Pennsylvania. This home may also be rented with furnishings for a total of $4000 per month. 1st and last month's rent plus security deposit equal to 3 month's rent payment required before move-in.

title: Welcome to beautiful 436 E. Thompson St. Located in the Heart of Fisht
description:
It is my distinguished honor to present to you 436 E. Thompson St. available for immediate occupancy. Located in the Heart of Fishtown, along the Delaware River, anchored by Commercial Mixed Use Corridors, including South St, and surrounded by residential properties, this property is situated at the intersection of a quaint & quiet neighborhood. This 3 story new construction townhouse features high end finishes and rooftop space. There is currently an occupant in the building and we are searching for 2 additional roommates. There is a 1 bedroom with a shared bathroom on the 2nd floor renting for $1050/month and a 3rd story bedroom loft with private en suite bathroom renting for $1475/month. All occupants will have access to the rooftop and backyard space and common living area (kitchen, living room, and dining room) The main floor features hardwood floors with high end finishes and lacquer cabinetry & open space that leads into a private backyard space. The property is filled with radiant natural light and illumination from large windows. Walk upstairs to the 2nd floor with 2 bedrooms and a shared bathroom. Continue up the winding staircase to the 3rd story bedroom loft with intricate dimensions and angles allowing for extra ceiling height. The 3rd floor has a loft bedroom and private en suite bathroom. The property is close to bus stops and close to multi-modal public transportation, commercial mixed used corridors with many retail businesses, food establishment, and other entertainment and amenities. To apply, we are running credit reports, criminal backgrounds, eviction history, and reviewing all income & financial documentation. If you are selected as a tenant, we will collect first, last & security deposit(one month). There are no minimum score requirements. The entire financial and credit profile will be reviewed in its entirety to determine application viability. We look forward to doing business with you and we will ensure a smooth, efficient, and professional process for all parties. Thank you for the opportunity to showcase this home and we wish you the best of luck in your home search.

title: FABULOUS PENTHOUSE CORNER STUDIO WITH BALCONY
description:
FABULOUS PENTHOUSE CORNER STUDIO WITH BALCONY. This one of a kind condo freshly painted, new kitchen and bath, windows on two walls with stunning views of the Art Museum, Fairmount Park and the river. The balcony is large enough for entertaining and has the same views. Refinished hardwood floors, washer and dryer and Murphy bed are all included. This building has a beautifully restored grand lobby with 24/7 concierge service, BRAND NEW state of the art fitness center, shuttle bus, community room, gas cooking, water, sewer are all included in the monthly fee. Restaurants, dog parks and playgrounds, running/walking and bike trails along the river, shopping, great brunch spots, Whole Foods, Starbucks, WaWa, cafes, galleries, Philadelphia Museum of Art, Franklin Institute, Museum of Natural Sciences, scenic Kelly Drive and Boathouse Row, BYOBs, Waterworks, theaters, and more. Minutes from other Center City areas like: Logan Square, Rittenhouse, the Business District and Fitler Square. Close to public transportation and easily accessible to/from major highways. A highly desirable Center City neighborhood plus the perks of being in a great building. Landlord to split $500 move in fee with Tenant.

title: Start this winter in a Philadelphia Chapter Landmark Property!
description:
Start this winter in a Philadelphia Chapter Landmark Property originally designed in 1951! Enter through the spacious remodeled lobby where you are greeted by a 24-hour front desk attendant. The property features a fitness center on the lower level along with common areas where you can relax and watch TV or catch up with friends with a game of pool. There's also a place to store your bike in the designated bike room. Looking for outdoor space? There's a roof deck that offers panoramic views of the city! The views are simply breathtaking! This large north facing one bedroom has beautiful hardwood parquet floors and a view you will LOVE! The living area and bedrooms are spacious and have tons of closet space. Monthly rent includes gas. SUPER Pet Friendly!! Come see what all the buzz is about at The Parkway House and everything that living in the Art Museum area has to offer!! ***Pictures featured are of the new model unit.***

title: P1804 Is A Fully Custom Northwestern Exposure, Corner Unit!
description:
P1804 is a fully custom Northwestern exposure, CORNER unit with BALCONY in the Peninsula. The unit features new hardwood flooring through the living room and secondary bedroom, and custom carpet in the primary bedroom. The unit can be rented PARTIALLY FURNISHED. The kitchen has new custom cabinetry, Carrara marble slabs for counters as well as backsplash, and a new stainless steel full appliance package! All living spaces are surrounded by floor-to-ceiling windows. The bathroom features new contemporary vanity, an 8-jetted Kohl er Jacuzzi style tub, whereas all the jets are fully independent of one another. P1804 has 10 FOOT HIGH CEILINGS, and conveys with custom window treatments, and light fixtures. One PARKING LICENSE IS INCLUDED, and heating and cooling is included in the condominium expense! Waterfront Square Condominium & Spa is a premier gated community offering 24/7 guard and gate, as well as concierge, valet parking, pool and hot tub with river deck, fitness center, sauna and steam room, massage rooms and community rooms. There is a 3- level garage, with Philadelphia's largest green roof situated on top, inclusive of putting green! Waterfront Square resides on a 9.5-acre riverfront enclave, with lush manicured outdoor common parks and gardens right on the river's edge. Management is on site, and Waterfront boasts an advanced security system with closed-circuit television. For your convenience, Global Limousine runs on site Monday-Friday, taking residents as far as 30th street and back home to their gated community. The river deck is oversized, encompassing a 25-meter heated lap pool (junior Olympic). Waterfront Square has an excellent location, due to its proximity to area highways & airports (676,95, all bridges), yet is nestled away on the Delaware River - the best of both worlds! If its unequivocal luxury, showcasing the best views in Philadelphia, adorned with amenities, then it must be Waterfront Square Condominium & Spa!
901 N Penn St #P1804

title: This is an elegant entry vestibule unit at The Lenox Condo
description: This is an elegant entry vestibule unit at The Lenox Condominium, one of the best pre-war buildings in the city. It also has one of the nicest layouts at the Lenox. It is a SE corner unit on a high floor with lots of windows, including 3 bay windows, great light and fantastic views. This unit is the largest one-bedroom in the building and has the same square footage as most two bedrooms units. The vestibule, large rooms and high ceilings give the home a grand look and feel. One side of the vestibule leads to a spacious living room with built in bookcases and two bay windows, a formal dining room and a beautiful kitchen. The fully renovated kitchen includes custom cabinets, stainless steel appliances, ceramic tile flooring and granite countertops. The other side of the vestibule has a huge bedroom that has a den, built in bookcases, walk-in-closet and a bay window. The master bedroom has a closet organizing system. The home has a split unit air conditioning system. The Lenox was designed by famed New York architects Clinton and Russell. It was built in 1920 and renovated into condos in 2004-5. The units have large scale rooms, high ceilings, lots of windows and most units have many of their original architectural elements. It is a doorman building and is centrally located at the southern end of Mid-town Village in Washington Square West. It is two blocks from the great shops, restaurants, theatres, Kimmel Center and night life of Midtown Village, Walnut Street and the Avenue of the Arts. It is also just a few blocks from Thomas Jefferson and Pennsylvania Hospitals. There are many gym, parking and public transportation options nearby. The Lenox has a large central laundry room, but the association now allows owners to install individual units within owner condos, with some restrictions and installation requirements.

title: Nestled in Fitler Square sits this handsome first floor 1 bed, 1 bath
description: Nestled in Fitler Square sits this handsome first floor 1 bed, 1 bath bi-level condo with private outdoor space! Thoughtfully maintained and recent updates make this home move-in ready! Walk inside the large front hall and enjoy the high ceilings and rich wood flooring as you are drawn into the open living space. Recessed lighting and large windows help to illuminate the living and dining area. Built-in bookshelves flank the ornate working fireplace and offer a cozy and charming ambience to gather with friends.  The updated kitchen features stainless steel appliances, built-in range and microwave, granite countertops and most importantly, access to a two-tiered private patio space. Enjoy grilling outside and dine al fresco under the cafe lights as the back patio oasis transports you back to your favorite outdoor cafe.  No exterior access to patio from street for optimal security/privacy. Back inside the bedroom level houses a laundry nook with stacked washer and dryer,  updated bath with stylish tile flooring and marble top vanity and a generously sized bedroom with ample closet space and windows that look out to the back patio.  The unit maximizes storage space, including the closet turned pottery studio by the current owner and some additional shared storage space in the basement. The condo building has rooftop access that could have a shared rooftop deck built with exceptional city skyline views. Located next door to Bacchus market and 2 blocks from Fitler Square farmers market, Schuylkill dog park and river trail. This location has amazing walkability to UPenn, HUP and CHOP along with neighborhood staples and restaurants including Cotoletta Fitler Square, Ambrosia, Rival Brothers Coffee, Pizzata Pizzeria and more!

title: 2 bed / 2.5 bath luxury condo with private roof deck/skyline views!
description:
Welcome to modern urban luxury living at Francisville Quarters!
910 N 16th Street Unit D is a bi-level top floor condominium, newly constructed in 2018 and located in the booming Francisville neighborhood just blocks from the rapidly developing North Broad, Ridge Ave and Fairmount Ave commercial corridors, and easily accessible to Center City via the Broad Street Line.
Upon entering Unit D you'll discover the main level's open concept floor plan design and connected kitchen/living room with ample natural and dimmable recessed LED lighting.
The kitchen features hand selected high end finishes including hardwood flooring, quartz countertops and custom Italian soft-close Aster Cucine cabinets, tied in with an intricate urban backsplash design and stainless steel appliances.
Connected to the kitchen by a breakfast bar and dining area is a spacious living room, well-lit by oversized windows and a sliding glass door leading to a balcony, the first of two private outdoor spaces with skyline views.
The main level is completed by a powder room, coat closet, and in-unit stacked washer/dryer closet.
Upstairs you'll find two spacious bedrooms with walk-in/sliding door closets and two ensuite bathrooms featuring ample cabinet space, Grohe fixtures, walk-in showers, and floor to ceiling tile. The primary bedroom also boasts a sliding glass door and Juliet balcony.
Continue upstairs to the high-ceilinged pilot house, through the landing space perfect for a dry bar, to a massive 440 square foot private roof deck with panorama views of Philadelphia's Center City skyline, City Hall, and the Benjamin Franklin Bridge.
Additional amenities at this one of a kind condominium include a tri-level video intercom security system, curbside trash room, keyless entry, and bike storage area.
Available April 2023, qualified applicants inquire to schedule your showing!
(Owner is a licensed real estate salesperson in Pennsylvania)
$2,350/month. First & last month's rent plus 1 month security deposit required prior to move in.
Tenant responsible for electric, water and cable if desired. Low utility bills enabled by energy efficient appliances and fixtures.
Qualified applicants must have $7,050+ household gross monthly income, 600+ credit score, no prior evictions and no significant criminal history.
